name: Scientia Consulting S.A.
overview:
Scientia Consulting S.A. is one of the leading consulting firms in Europe and one of the Strongest Companies, based on European Credit Rating Agencies, with a customers’ portfolio that includes the leading companies/organizations in its target industries. Scientia’s services are based on WEB and IT Sector and the company targets clients from the relevant industries, including Venture Capitals with WEB Investments, WEB Startups and established Companies with a Dedicated WEB Business Unit.

Scientia employs passionate people, who follow out – of – the - box approaches in their work. The company invests constantly in developing and sustaining knowledge, since the solutions it offers are based on research.

One of the main points that differentiate Scientia Consulting from other consulting firms is its customer – oriented approach, which enables its people to provide clients with high added value services, while offering a Service Level Agreement (SLA) which guarantees the quality level of the services offered. Through this approach, every client joins Scientia’s network of companies, which includes organizations and partners which have strong bonds with Scientia, and grows through this customer – oriented approach.

The deep understanding of new and emerging technologies, as well as the ability of its people to quickly understand new industries, allows Scientia to offer innovative solutions to its clients, thus putting them in a leading position in their respective market.
